name: Regen. Thumbs
author: Alexandre Froger

sections.description: This plugin adds a button to the WordPress post edit screen (Classic Editor) to regenerate all the thumbnails associated to the post using ajax.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/regen-thumbs directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Voil√†!
sections.faq:
What are the settings available?

This plugin does not need settings: once activate, its effect is immediate, and it can be deactivated or uninstalled with no side effect.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Bump version and support notice for WordPress 5.0

1.0

  • First version

short_description: Regen. Thumbs - regenerate WordPress post thumbnails per post in one click!
description: This plugin adds a button to the WordPress post edit screen (Classic Editor) to regenerate all the thumbnails associated to the post using ajax.
